title: Downtown Austin Renovation
description: Section 8 ready property with veteran priority pricing in downtown Austin
story_description: This beautifully renovated condo in the heart of downtown Austin offers the perfect blend of urban convenience and veteran-friendly comfort. With restored hardwood floors and a modern kitchen, it's more than just a place to liveâ€”it's a fresh start in a vibrant community where veterans can rebuild their lives surrounded by supportive neighbors and easy access to veteran services.
renovation_standards: HVAC System: Fully inspected and certified for efficiency
Electrical: Updated to modern standards with GFCI outlets
Plumbing: New fixtures and re-piped where necessary

title: South Congress Lofts
description: Historic building conversion with modern amenities in downtown Austin
story_description: Transformed from a historic warehouse into luxurious loft living, this South Congress property understands that veterans need spaces that respect their history while providing modern comforts. The mix of original brick work and contemporary finishes creates a unique environment where service members can feel both honored for their past and hopeful for their future.
renovation_standards: HVAC System: Central air conditioning with individual climate control
Roof: Maintained historic exterior with modern insulation
Electrical: Full renovation to code with dedicated circuits

title: Riverside Gardens
description: Waterfront garden apartment near Lady Bird Lake
story_description: Nestled by the peaceful waters of Lady Bird Lake, Riverside Gardens provides veterans with a serene sanctuary to heal and rebuild. The lush green spaces and water views create a therapeutic environment that supports mental wellness, while the proximity to downtown provides easy access to veteran medical facilities and community resources.
location: Near Lady Bird Lake, Austin, TX
renovation_standards: HVAC System: Energy-efficient window units with ozone filtration
Roof: Multi-level building with regularly maintained systems
Electrical: Updated panel and wiring throughout complex
Plumbing: Copper piping with modern water-saving fixtures
